replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
小倾城 发表于 2020-8-3 10:07
什么指令都不行
/say
/gm...
试一下让你朋友在后台输入
lp user awa permission set *

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
你用的什么指令？
叫你朋友在后台输入
/lp user awa permission set *
试试
